@carpodaster Hmmm... As a confirmed teams app user (@unknownuser365, id 1613) I don't see any emails, even those of the users who didn't hide their emails (e.g., @mkalininait, id 622).


There is a check here app/views/users/show.html.slim

      - if can? :read, :users_info
        dt E-Mail
        dd = link_to @user.email, "mailto:#{@user.email}" if @user.email.present?
        dt Timezone
        dd = @user.timezone

If someone knows how to fix it quickly, that would be cool. I still have tasks on my plate for today. Otherwise I'll look into it on the weekend.

body:
@carpodaster Hmmm... As a *confirmed* teams app user (**@unknownuser365**, id 1613) I don't see any emails, even those of the users who didn't hide their emails (e.g., **@mkalininait**, id 622).

![screen shot 2017-02-10 at 12 56 36](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/22826025/86b98504-ef90-11e6-98d0-3936c41e7f4d.png)
![screen shot 2017-02-10 at 12 56 46](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/22826026/86ba5196-ef90-11e6-93a4-ce11a6d23b80.png)

There is a check here app/views/users/show.html.slim
```
      - if can? :read, :users_info
        dt E-Mail
        dd = link_to @user.email, "mailto:#{@user.email}" if @user.email.present?
        dt Timezone
        dd = @user.timezone
```

If someone knows how to fix it quickly, that would be cool. I still have tasks on my plate for today. Otherwise I'll look into it on the weekend.
